long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:

Side Bar on your favorite pages for your favorite pages. Click + to add the current page to the list. Click the extension icon to toggle Side Bar on or off. You can even clear all favorites at once from the same popup menu.

This is adding a desirable feature that isn't currently available by default. No need to run out of space in the bookmarks bar. Enjoy.
